pr_title: [#2115] Fix wrong exception if tenant not found in PreCredentialsValidationHandler

timeline.bodyText: WHEN a device of a non-existing tenant tries to connect
timeline.author: sophokles73
sophokles73

timeline.message:
[#2115] Fix wrong exception if tenant not found.

A 404 error when fetching the tenant in the
PreCredentialsValidationHandler should be interpreted
as a "bad credentials" error.

Signed-off-by: Carsten Lohmann <carsten.lohmann@bosch.io>
